sections.Biography:
==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
At [[Castle Black]], [[Jon Snow]] orders Wendel to pack extra rations while preparing for his [[Raid on Craster's Keep|raid]] of [[Craster's Keep]].<ref>"[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"</ref>
